thread.title: Ai Weiwei unveils refugee boat artwork at Sydney festival

title: Ai Weiwei unveils refugee boat artwork at Sydney festival
text:
Ai Weiwei unveils refugee boat artwork at Sydney festival Monday, March 12, 2018 - 01:07 
Chinese artist and dissident Ai Weiwei unveiled a 60-metre inflatable rubber raft artwork carrying more than 300 anonymous oversized figures in Sydney on Monday, highlighting the plight of refugees across the world. No reporter narration.   
Chinese artist and dissident Ai Weiwei unveiled a 60-metre inflatable rubber raft artwork carrying more than 300 anonymous oversized figures in Sydney on Monday, highlighting the plight of refugees across the world. No reporter narration.  //reut.rs/2Ikmabu
